mention.text: a 100 percenter in eyes of the National Rifle Association leadership
the entire Oregon House delegation , regardless of party
NRA leadership The conventional wisdom still is
the Brady Bill -- the seven-day waiting period for persons wanting to buy handguns
the seven-day waiting period for persons wanting to buy handguns
assault weapons , apparently intended for sale on the black market One youth was shot to death during the crime

their state as an island in a sea of national crime and violence When a gunman with a long criminal history blew away five children in a Stockton , Calif. , schoolyard two years ago , Oregonians were appalled to discover a gunman with a long criminal history
10,000 convicted felons trying to buy handguns
